name: Arcane: Under the Voice
description:
Developed by Team Tortilla from UdG (Students).

You can also check our last game here: https://team-tortilla.itch.io/beyondreality

Synopsis:

You will get into the skin of a future bounty hunter and you will have to pass the training to discover your hidden skills and please The Voice.

During the training you will need to stay alert to prevent the enemies from killing you.

Controls:

 

Keyboard

Gamepad

Player Movement

WASD

Left Joystick

Camera Movement

Mouse

Right Joystick

Statue Interaction

E

X

Basic Attack

Left Click

RT

Cast Ability

Right Click

LT

Select Ability

Mouse Wheel or Number Buttons

LB/RB

Pause Menu

Esc

Start Button
